summary:
Heimsk\'s proaching hours reduced. Slighly immersion breaking.
(Heimskr is the NPC usually proaching about Talos in Whiterun in front of Talos\' shrine.)
descriptionHtml:
(Heimskr is the NPC usually proaching about Talos from 5am to 8pm in Whiterun in front of Talos\' shrine.)
I couldn\'t bear him anymore but couldn\'t either bring myself to murder him. Not willing to \"muffle\" him I changed his scheadule a bit. So now he proaches only on Sundas and should shout a bit less that day too. 

Immersion breaking.

Installation: extract into your skyrim data foulder. make sure the .esp is checked when running the game.

Uninstallation: delete the .esp from your skyrim data foulder or just untick it.

Bugs: none known to me yet.
author: stsg
